input.sentences: we went to a horse farm today .
their lashes are very long and full .
before long | the horses went to graze .
our time at the farm is up | but we will be back in the future .
output.sentences: I went to a horse farm the other day.
Their lashes were long and luxurious.
I relaxed while watching the horses graze.
I would like to spend a lot of time in the future at the farm.
